title: Chemistry and Biochemistry Memorial Scholarship Fund
description: Scholarship support for undergraduate and graduate students in chemistry and biochemistry in memory and recognition of the contributions of current and past faculty and staff in the Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: Scholarship support for undergraduate and graduate students in chemistry and biochemistry in memory and recognition of the contributions of current and past faculty and staff in the Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry at CU Boulder.
